content: cast on one stitch knit 15 stitches pm place marker this will mark the start of the pinkie and finish round you should have 16 stitches from the start of the row to the start of the pinkie or second marker we will work on it later knit for 1 5 inches from the recently cast on 2 stitches take the large-eyed sewing needle and thread contrasting yarn through it in preparation for holding non-working stitches while we complete the thumb place 41 stitches from the needles on the contrasting yarn stitch holder and tie a gentle knot so you can untie it and re-use thread later it is best tied near the thumb keeping a marker at the beginning of the round this thread allows us to try on the gloves and check fit while staying out of the way the 41 stitches will be used as follows 9 pinky 10 ring finger 10 middle finger 12 forefinger attach yarn at the beginning of the 2 cast-on stitches at the thumb base place thumb stitches on needles and pick up 2 stitches in the space join and continue knitting around for 1 25 inches bind off all thumb stitches i like to turn my work inside-out at the completion of each digit and use the tail to even-up the edge i pull the tail firmly then sew it into the stitch next to it i weave the rest of the tail up and down the inside stitches to secure it then trim the excess thumb complete pinky now we want to separate the pinky stitches from the rest they are the 9 stitches beginning at the second marker place 25 stitches on needles knit 16 stitches then remove marker knit 9 pinky stitches stop then place these 9 stitches on needles for the pinky all other stitches should be placed on the contrasting yarn stitch holder cast on 2 stitches after the 9 join and knit for 1 inch bind off these stitches ring finger remove 5 stitches from the yarn holder at the front of the glove closest to the pinky and 5 stitches from the back of the glove closest to the pinky place on needles and re-secure your yarn stitch holder if knitting left glove attach yarn on palm side before 5 stitches k5 c/o 2 k5 pick up 2 stitches from base of pinky join if knitting the right glove attach yarn before or to the right of 5 stitches on front of glove knit 5 cast on 2 k5 pick up 2 stitches at pinky base 14 total stitches knit for 1 inch bind off middle finger repeat same as for ring finger 14 total stitches forefinger place remaining 12 stitches on 3 needles attach yarn before the space this is a change pick up 2 stitches join and knit for 1 inch bind off all 14 stitches turn inside out sew in all loose ends then trim excess this is a great
